issue.title: Disable joint markers for all but the "active" joint when Inspector is open

content.raw:
Personally, I like to have all joint markers there at the same time. It helps visualizing the model as a whole, if that makes sense.

I guess we could highlight the joint whose editor is currently focused, maybe with a bounding box, like when the joint is selected. In other words, when an inspector is focused, select its corresponding part/joint.

Similar to issue #1352 for the Building Editor.
